'''Phony Bejeweled Unihornfish''' is a type of [[Ornamental Fish]]. They can be raised as pets in the [[Serenitea Pot]] using [[Ornamental Fish Furnishings]]. A total of 12 Phony Bejeweled Unihornfish can be obtained from the [[Invasive Fish Wrangler]] Event.
